name: Xiangling
title: Chef de Cuisine
description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

normalattack.name: Dough-Fu
normalattack.description: Perform up to five consecutive spear strikes. When charged, she lunges forward and deals damage to enemies.

elementalskill.name: Guoba Attack
elementalskill.description: Summons Guoba the Panda to breathe fire and deal AoE Pyro DMG.

elementalburst.name: Pyronado
elementalburst.description: Creates a flaming tornado that causes Pyro DMG.

passivetalent1.name: Chef de Cuisine
passivetalent1.description: There's a 12% chance of getting two food items when achieving Perfect Cooking on ATK-boosting recipes.

passivetalent3.name: Beware, ITs Super Hot!
passivetalent3.description: When Guoba finishes attacking, it leaves a chili pepper behind. Picking this up increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

constellations.d1: Enemies hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.
constellations.d2: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the enemy for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Pyronado by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Guoba Attack by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.

profile.description: The Head Chef at the Wanmin Restaurant and also a waitress there, Xiangling is extremely passionate about cooking and excels at her signature hot and spicy dishes. Though still young, Xiangling is a true master of the culinary arts with all the skills of a kitchen veteran. She enjoys a good reputation among the hearty eaters at Chihu Rock. There's absolutely no need to be nervous if she wants you to sample her latest creation. It will not disappoint. Promise.
